outputStatus (line 41)

Output a status symbol after each test run.

. for Pass, E for error/exception, F for failure, and P for pending. This subclass of the Text reporter attempts to use console text coloring where available.

  • access: public
void outputStatus (string $symbol)
  • string $symbol
